title: Saying Thank You
body: Saying thank you is very important because you are thanking someone
author: Justin Wu

title: Play Dates
body: Play dates are a fun way to spend time with your friends
author: Lynne Wang

title: Saying Please
body: Saying please is very important because you are asking something from someone
author: Grace Tian

title: Saying Sorry
body: Saying sorry is very important because you are apologizing to someone
author: Vatsal Varma

title: Going to the Doctor's Office
body: Going to doctor's office is very important if you are sick.
author: David Wu
